ygData.subject: Re: Money??
ygData.msgSnippet: Hrmmm... well straight melee s usually have more money than casters or hybrids. This is because we have to worry about spells. Those cost plat. I used
ygData.messageBody:
Hrmmm... well straight melee's usually have more
money than casters or hybrids. This is because we have
to worry about spells. Those cost plat.<br><br>I
used to have money problems too. After I got gate, it
helped greatly with money. I'd got to velious or
dreadlands or FV. Good gate places.<br><br>Another thing I
used to do was the CB belt quest. That's good for
faction, Exp, AND some coins. It also gives you and item.
I decked my Druid in leather that way and sold
extras for a few gold each. Not too bad. You can also
sell CB belts for a plat a piece. But the faction and
exp always made me turn in the belts. Too valuable in
too many ways to sell.<br><br>Oh... but sell your DF
belts. Reason I say that is cause it gives you terrible
faction hits. Those that don't care about faction-- well
that's okay I suppose. I sell DF belts for about 2 to 4
plat each though and to me-- that's a lot more
important than killing my faction that I'd have to work to
regain.<br><br>That's just my 2 cents on CB versus DF
belts.<br><br>shooman out<br>Fatedhue Prismatic<br><br>PS...
CB=crushbone, DF=deathfist.<br>Both are bands of Orcs in EQ
